author: Ayhan Demiriz and Kristin P. Bennett and John Shawe and I. Nouretdinov V.
title: Linear Programming Boosting via Column Generation
venue: Dept. of Decision Sciences and Eng. Systems, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
window: criterion for stopping when an optimal ensemble is found that is reached in relatively few iterations. It uses few weak hypotheses. There are only 81 possible stumps on the Breast Cancer dataset (nine attributes having nine possible values), so clearly AdaBoost may require the same tree to be generated multiple times.
